mapper.select: select * from tst_system_html where is_delete='0' and html_id=#{html_code}
select * from tst_system_html where is_delete='0' and parent_id=#{parent_id}
select * from tst_system_html_style where is_delete='0' and style_type=#{style_type}
select * from tst_percent where FIND_IN_SET(percent_type,#{percent_type}) and is_delete='0'

select "团购提醒" as msg_title, concat("团购商品'",d.goods_name,"'人数已满") as msg_desc, "group" as msg_type, a.group_buy_id as relation_id, a.create_time from tst_group_buy as a inner join tst_group_buy_member as b on a.member_group_buy_id=b.member_group_buy_id inner join tst_group_buy_goods as c on b.goods_group_buy_id=c.goods_group_buy_id and CONVERT(b.group_buy_now_people,DOUBLE)>=CONVERT(c.group_buy_need_people,DOUBLE) inner join tst_goods as d on c.goods_id=d.goods_id where a.member_id=#{member_id} and a.group_buy_state='wait_send'

select "预售提醒" as msg_title, concat("预售商品'",b.goods_name,"'已到发货时间") as msg_desc, "pre" as msg_type, a.order_id as relation_id, b.send_goods_time from tst_order as a inner join tst_order_goods as b on a.order_id=b.order_id and b.is_pre_sale='1' where a.member_id=#{member_id}
